participant_1.background: i work from home. i like to spend my money on cars. i've never had a steady relationship. i watch too much tv in spare time. i go to the gym most days just to socialize.

participant_2.background: i'm here for shoplifting. i feel old. i'm currently in a juvenile detention center. i will be released in about a month. my mom is coming to visit me tomorrow.

content.text: A Volvo. Even a Mercedes for that.
